recipesJson.name: Kings Custard One-Shot - LiquidBarn Tastemakers
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is the One-Shot recipe for the luxuriously decadent vanilla butterscotch custard recipe, Kings Custard

Pick up Kings Custard here:
https://diyordie.link/kingscustard-atf

Flavor Notes & Full Recipe:
https://diyordie.link/kingscustard-atf-recipe
